plentry.pd:
0: Default value.
In live broadcast scenarios: 48 kHz sampling rate, music encoding, mono channel, maximum bitrate 64 Kbps.
In communication scenarios:
Windows platform: 16 kHz sampling rate, speech encoding, mono channel, maximum bitrate 16 Kbps.
macOS platform: 32 kHz sampling rate, speech encoding, mono channel, maximum bitrate 18 Kbps.
1: Specifies 32 kHz sampling rate, speech encoding, mono channel, maximum bitrate 18 Kbps.
2: Specifies 48 kHz sampling rate, music encoding, mono channel, maximum bitrate 64 Kbps.
3: Specifies 48 kHz sampling rate, music encoding, stereo channel, maximum bitrate 80 Kbps. To achieve stereo, you also need to call and set audioProcessingChannels to AudioProcessingStereo in .
4: Specifies 48 kHz sampling rate, music encoding, mono channel, maximum bitrate 96 Kbps.
5: Specifies 48 kHz sampling rate, music encoding, stereo channel, maximum bitrate 128 Kbps. To achieve stereo, you also need to call and set audioProcessingChannels to AudioProcessingStereo in .
6: Specifies 16 kHz sampling rate, speech encoding, mono channel, applies echo cancellation algorithm AEC.
Enumeration value boundary.

0: Default value.
In live broadcast: 48 kHz sample rate, music encoding, mono, max bitrate 64 Kbps.
In communication: 32 kHz sample rate, speech encoding, mono, max bitrate 18 Kbps.
1: Sets 32 kHz sample rate, speech encoding, mono, max bitrate 18 Kbps.
2: Sets 48 kHz sample rate, music encoding, mono, max bitrate 64 Kbps.
3: Sets 48 kHz sample rate, music encoding, stereo, max bitrate 80 Kbps. To enable stereo, you also need to call and set audioProcessingChannels to AudioProcessingStereo in .
4: Sets 48 kHz sample rate, music encoding, mono, max bitrate 96 Kbps.
5: Sets 48 kHz sample rate, music encoding, stereo, max bitrate 128 Kbps. To enable stereo, you also need to call and set audioProcessingChannels to AudioProcessingStereo in .
6: Sets 16 kHz sample rate, speech encoding, mono, applies echo cancellation algorithm AEC.
Boundary of enum values.

0: Default value.
In live broadcast: 48 kHz sample rate, music encoding, mono, max bitrate 64 Kbps.
In communication:
Windows: 16 kHz sample rate, voice encoding, mono, max bitrate 16 Kbps.
Android, macOS, iOS: 32 kHz sample rate, voice encoding, mono, max bitrate 18 Kbps.
1: 32 kHz sample rate, voice encoding, mono, max bitrate 18 Kbps.
2: 48 kHz sample rate, music encoding, mono, max bitrate 64 Kbps.
3: 48 kHz sample rate, music encoding, stereo, max bitrate 80 Kbps. To enable stereo, you also need to call and set audioProcessingChannels to audioProcessingStereo in .
4: 48 kHz sample rate, music encoding, mono, max bitrate 96 Kbps.
5: 48 kHz sample rate, music encoding, stereo, max bitrate 128 Kbps. To enable stereo, you also need to call and set audioProcessingChannels to audioProcessingStereo in .
6: 16 kHz sample rate, voice encoding, mono, applies echo cancellation algorithm AEC.
Enum boundary value.

0: Default value.
In live broadcast scenarios: 48 kHz sampling rate, music encoding, mono, max bitrate 64 Kbps.
In communication scenarios:
Windows: 16 kHz sampling rate, voice encoding, mono, max bitrate 16 Kbps.
Android, macOS, iOS: 32 kHz sampling rate, voice encoding, mono, max bitrate 18 Kbps.
1: Specifies 32 kHz sampling rate, voice encoding, mono, max bitrate 18 Kbps.
2: Specifies 48 kHz sampling rate, music encoding, mono, max bitrate 64 Kbps.
3: Specifies 48 kHz sampling rate, music encoding, stereo, max bitrate 80 Kbps. To enable stereo, you also need to call and set audioProcessingChannels in to AUDIO_PROCESSING_STEREO.
4: Specifies 48 kHz sampling rate, music encoding, mono, max bitrate 96 Kbps.
5: Specifies 48 kHz sampling rate, music encoding, stereo, max bitrate 128 Kbps. To enable stereo, you also need to call and set audioProcessingChannels in to AUDIO_PROCESSING_STEREO.
6: Specifies 16 kHz sampling rate, voice encoding, mono, applies echo cancellation algorithm AEC.
Enumeration boundary value.
